item.title: Browny Machine Writeup (easy)
item.description: ====================== Quick Summary Hey guys , today I will walkthrough step by step in Browny Machine. this Machine is so good for beginner in pentration testing you will gonna learn a lot in this experenice. It is an easy linux machine , We will exploit Xplico Remote Code Execution in a vulnerable version Xplico that listen on port 9876 by default. There is a hidden end-point at inside of the Xplico that allow anyone to create a new user that can execute a terminal command under the context of the root user.
